videoJson.name: M
videoJson.fact1: This was the first component format consisting of two separate signal systems: one for luminance (Y) and one for chroma.
videoJson.fact2: The signals were recorded on the tape on separate tracks using separate heads.
videoJson.fact3: "The format was called "M" due to the shape of the threading path of the tape around the helical scan video head drum, which resembles a letter M."
videoJson.fact4: The format was initially designed to use ordinary VHS cassettes.
